activities: EMD Serono, Inc. is a U.S. biopharmaceutical company with fully integrated commercial, clinical, and research operations in Massachusetts. EMD Serono has more than 30 clinical trials in its global clinical pipeline. EMD Serono receives personal information from clinical trial participants, employees, job applicants, customers, consumers, and business partners in the EU.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: As set forth in the Definitions section of the Policy, the personal data processed by EMD Serono covered by the Safe Harbor includes data that is transferred from the EEA or Switzerland to the US, is recorded in any form, is about or pertains to a specific individual, and can be linked to that individual.Offline, on-line, manually processed data and human resource data are covered by the Policy.
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner; for all other data: EMD Serono subscribes to TRUSTe's dispute resolution process, as the independent recourse mechanism to investigate unresolved complaints, and provides contact information for the same in the Policy.
